attributes.action: allow all members of the RUC to wear the George Cross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear Sir in recognition of the RUC's service to Northern Ireland I call upon you to allow each member of the force to wear their medal in public with pride.  This is not a petition this is a request from those of us who have suffered in the name of being British even as roman catholics who served this great force
